content: row 1 32 chain then starting from 2nd chain 1 single_crochet into each chain you will end up with 31 stitches you will need 31 stitches to create 30 pixel blocks as the last single_crochet will end with single_crochet instead of pixel stitch row 2 to row 30 follow colour change based on the pattern with pixel stitch row 31 single_crochet into each stitch you do not have to use pixel stitch bubble stitch will create similar result to explain how pixel stitch works if you have trouble with the video tutorial on rs insert hook into the first stitch yarn over pull through insert hook into the next stitch yarn over pull through you should have three loops on the hook now yarn over pull through the first two loops yarn over pull through the two loops left on the hook to start the next pixel stitch insert hook into the last stitch from the previous pixel stitch start from again on ws follow the same steps except that you insert your hook from the back of the stitch pull the yarn from front to back when you hit the last stitch on the row finish with a single_crochet
